Package server

Class GameServerCommandHandler<T extends GameServer>

java.lang.Object
server.CommandHandler<T>
server.GameServerCommandHandler<T>
Type Parameters:
T - 
public class GameServerCommandHandler<T extends GameServer>
extends CommandHandler<T>
A command handler for generic game servers. Implements the following commands:
Command What it does Status Code Response
start Starts the server 200 if server starts successfully, 500 otherwise {}
stop Stops the server 200 if server stops successfully, 500 otherwise {}
restart Restarts the server 200 if server restarts successfully, 500 otherwise {}
log Gets a log of the recent server output 200 {'result': string}
running Checks if the server is running 200 {'result': boolean}
ipaddress Gets the full IP address that is required to connect to the server from anywhere 200 {'result': string}
Author:
Collin
